text: I've am also trying to figure out what is going on with the crash reports from the extension side of things. BUT, somehow we lost our nice stack traces for those, and now only get the line number in the bundled javascript file of things, which is completely useless (because _everything_ in the bundle is on line 1)... Not I'm pretty positive we had nice filenames and line numbers in those crash reports in the past, so I think something must be broken with our source maps now.
